text: Pas, saʙr kun ej pajomʙar, ʙa ozoru azijati musrikon, hamcunon ki pajomʙaroni ululazm saʙr karda ʙudand. Va dar azoʙ dodani onho sitoʙ makun. On ruz, ki on va'daero, ki ʙa onho doda sudaast, ʙingarand, pindorand, ki cuz dar dunjo ʙa qadri soate az ruz hajot nadidaand. In xaʙar astu ʙas ʙaroi onon va ƣajrason. Pas tanho mardumi fosiqi ʙadkor, halok (azoʙ) karda mesavand
